backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two UI-related features and the files they modify.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining the global OKLCH color theme, light/dark variables, and default border/background styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with font imports and root element for mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component assembling all marketing sections with a global background texture.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Card.t: Reusable styled card component with border, padding, and hover shadow.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Interactive contact form with validation, simulated submission, and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Footer showing logo, contact details, and copyright line.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Header: Sticky responsive header with logo, scroll-linked navigation, mobile sheet menu, and a photo placeholder box.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Wrapper component providing consistent section spacing and scroll margin.
frontend/src/components/marketing/sectio: About section with text, highlight list, and a photo placeholder box.
Renders a grid of 12 color placeholders with images-to-be-added and note inputs stored in component state.
Displays contact information and embeds a contact form with fields for email, phone, and location placeholders.
Hero banner with headline, description, and buttons that smooth-scroll to the contact and about sections.
Shows a four-step workflow with icons and descriptions presented in a responsive grid.
Simple section describing available Chaniya Choli services for bridal and sider use.
Empty file intended for a testimonials section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, including login, logout, identity loading, and status handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom color variables, typography, global resets, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current website requirements, theme directions, and existing implemented features for a minimalistic marketing site. Includes architectural notes about color palette updates, an About-section photo placeholder, and removal of colored overlays on images.
